name: UGridSlot
doc:
A slot for UGridPanel, these slots all share the same size as the largest slot
in the grid.

Padding: The padding area between the slot and the content it contains.
HorizontalAlignment: The alignment of the object horizontally.
VerticalAlignment: The alignment of the object vertically.
Row: The row index of the cell this slot is in
Column: The column index of the cell this slot is in
Layer: Positive values offset this cell to be hit-tested and drawn on top of others. Default is 0; i.e. no offset.
Nudge: Offset this slot's content by some amount; positive values offset to lower right

methods.name: SetColumn
methods.doc: Sets the column index of the slot, this determines what cell the slot is in the panel

methods.name: SetColumnSpan
methods.doc: How many columns this slot spans over

methods.name: SetLayer
methods.doc: Sets positive values offset this cell to be hit-tested and drawn on top of others.

methods.name: SetNudge
methods.doc: Sets the offset for this slot's content by some amount; positive values offset to lower right

methods.name: SetRow
methods.doc: Sets the row index of the slot, this determines what cell the slot is in the panel

methods.name: SetRowSpan
methods.doc: How many rows this this slot spans over
